name: Antenna Dilemma - Soundtrack
detailed_description:
The Official Soundtrack for Antenna Dilemma features five tracks from the first chapter of Antenna Dilemma, plus two bonus tracks which weren't included in the game. All tracks are delivered in mp3 format, wrapped up in a warm blanket of lo-fi, saturated fuzziness.

All tracks composed by Philip Aldous.

Track List
1. Static
2. A Strange Meeting
3. Ghost Town
4. The Dice's Theme
5. Main Menu
6. Al's Theme (Bonus Track)
7. Stutter (Bonus Track)

All files will be installed in Antenna Dilemma Steam folder, which is by default:
C:\Program Files\Steam\SteamApps\common\AntennaDilemma\Soundtrack
